A poem on the fall of the southside of S. Paul's Cathedrall to which is added a satyre against the fanatick boutefeus of these times, and a memoriall offer'd up at the tomb of the incomparable Mr. John Cleaveland : never before exactly printed. T. P.
[2], 4 p.
Printed and are to be sold by Roger Vaughan ..., London : 1662.
Dedication signed: T.P. "Licensed and published according to order" Imperfect: Satyre lacking on film.
=======
